title: 50 Things to Know to Travel on a Budget
description: When I began travelling, I was not prepared for the little costs that greeted me around every corner. I wish I had done my research before going abroad so I could have saved myself a few of the unexpected surprises and expensive setbacks I wasn’t prepared for. While I certainly know the ins-and-outs of budget travel now, it has been a long and pricey road. Hopefully this list of ‘50 things to know to travel on a budget’ will help other fellow travelers as they make their way around the world on their own budgets. This book also includes 7 Things You May Forget When Traveling on an Airplane, 6 Steps to Booking Your Dream Cruise- Tips to Save Money on a Cruise, and helpful budget travel resources. A great start to planning your next vacation.
author: Lisa M. Rusczyk
